Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2010 02:01AM lin213 wrote: Hello Dana, I have been in the dental field for 18 years.  If you had a root canal on August 3rd and they completed it,  it should not hurt.  Root canal is "removing the nerves" in a tooth therefore you should not have pain.  However, if it is not yet completed it is possible to have discomfort but not extending into your throat or into your arm..  I would speak to the DDS that performed the root canal just to double check.  Best of luck to you!

Posts.Content: Aug 21, 2010 08:21PM lin213 wrote: I finished 7 weeks of Rads in December 2009 after Mastectomy without reconstruction. I am experiencing the same symptoms.  When I wake up I feel as if my ribs were in a vice all night.  I also have tenderness when pressing on ribs, oncologists are not concerened.  They both say it is post rads and post Mx "pains".  My skin is very tight to my chest wall.   It is very uncomfortable!  I worry because I had a CT scan in march of this year and there was a nodule on my left lung as well as the base of my right lung.  They were 4mm each.  Can this pain be something more than post rad ?  I hope so... Feel Better-Linda
